routing_rules.skip: fit_score < 0.40 — discard entirely, no Notion entry
routing_rules.manual_only: fit_score 0.40–0.49 — manual queue only, never auto-apply
routing_rules.high_priority: fit_score 0.75–0.89 — route by form complexity, high priority
routing_rules.force_manual: fit_score >= 0.90 — always manual regardless of form complexity
